/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a tree-lined street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street that stretches out into the distance. The street is flanked by lush green trees on both sides, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. In the distance, a person can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the otherwise tranquil setting. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The image does not contain any text or other discernible details. The relative positions of the objects suggest a well-planned urban layout, with the trees providing a natural border to the street. The person walking adds a dynamic element to the scene, suggesting movement and activity amidst the stillness. Overall, the image presents a harmonious blend of urban design and natural beauty.
